Little Wedge Salad with Sour Cream Dressing Recipe | Bon Appétit

Cover and chill.SaladStep 3Trim root end of lettuce; discard any wilted outer leaves. Cut into quarters lengthwise, then cut each quarter crosswise into 3" pieces. Without separating wedges into leaves, transfer to a large platter. Tuck avocado pieces among lettuce and drizzle lemon juice over; season with salt.Step 4Spoon half of dressing over salad and top with chives; season with pepper. Serve with remaining dressing alongside.How would you rate Little Wedge Salad with Sour Cream Dressing?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (3)Back to TopTriangleI loved everything about these cute little wedges - especially the dressing. AnonymousMilwaukee5/11/2020Doubled the recipe for a large dinner party, but otherwise made it exactly as is. It was a huge hit!
